experience.title: UX Researcher II
experience.description: • Owning end-to-end research initiatives to enhance the Disney+ Hotstar consumption experience across entertainment (movies, GEC) & sports : focusing on delivering user-centred insights.  • Informing UX and product decisions by identifying user behaviours and leveraging the right research methodologies across pre and post-release stages.  • Collaborating with leadership and cross-functional teams to co-own org-wide initiatives that democratize research and promote its adoption across the company.
experience.description_html: • Owning end-to-end research initiatives to enhance the Disney+ Hotstar consumption experience across entertainment (movies, GEC) & sports : focusing on delivering user-centred insights. • Informing UX and product decisions by identifying user behaviours and leveraging the right research methodologies across pre and post-release stages. • Collaborating with leadership and cross-functional teams to co-own org-wide initiatives that democratize research and promote its adoption across the company.

experience.title: Founder + Content Creator
experience.description: A one-stop source for internship-related content. Learned how to build distribution from scratch. 0 to 1. Started in my sophomore year & ran the newsletter for ~3 years (0 to 5K+ subs). Continue to maintain a presence on X (@internclick) : 1.8k+ followers and ~200K impressions per month.

experience.title: UX Researcher II
experience.description: • Owned end to end research (foundational & evaluative) for the Glance surfaces for International markets (North America): Lockscreen, Homescreen & Folders.• Stages : Pre-Product (Ideation), Launch to PMF (0 → 1), Growth (1→100).• Led several in-house initiatives to democratise research across the org.• Led evaluative research for multiple novel features focused on engagement & retention of DAU.• Conducted foundational studies to revamp the lock screen experience in India across OEMs
experience.description_html: • Owned end to end research (foundational & evaluative) for the Glance surfaces for International markets (North America): Lockscreen, Homescreen & Folders.• Stages : Pre-Product (Ideation), Launch to PMF (0 → 1), Growth (1→100).• Led several in-house initiatives to democratise research across the org.• Led evaluative research for multiple novel features focused on engagement & retention of DAU.• Conducted foundational studies to revamp the lock screen experience in India across OEMs

experience.title: UX Researcher I
experience.description: •  As the First Researcher and early bird #10, built user research from scratch to an embedded function within product development for BimaPe's wallet offering - a consumer-facing unified platform. •  Owned all studies independently across foundational and evaluative projects. •  Created quantitative research capabilities from ground up to create the bedrock of measuring quick impact experiments and feature launches.
experience.description_html: • As the First Researcher and early bird #10, built user research from scratch to an embedded function within product development for BimaPe's wallet offering - a consumer-facing unified platform. • Owned all studies independently across foundational and evaluative projects. • Created quantitative research capabilities from ground up to create the bedrock of measuring quick impact experiments and feature launches. <!---->

experience.title: Design & Research Intern
experience.description: Interned at multiple startups focused on establishing user research/scaling user-centred design.StoryXpress : SaaS video-tech startup for retail brands.Bounce: dockless scooter rentals startup.OkCredit: digital bookkeeping solution for MSME's.Vitraya : Auto-adjudication of claims, improving interactions between hospitals, TPAs & patients.
